name: difference_0
instruction: Choose the differences between a window and a pane.

instances.input:
A) Only a pane is made of glass	B) A pane is always bigger than a window	C) A pane is a piece of a window
D) A window is always made up of 4 panes	E) You can always call a window a pane
instances.output: C) A pane is a piece of a window

name: difference_1
instruction: Choose the differences between an outlet and a plug.

instances.input:
A) Only an outlet is a source of electricity	B) Only an outlet provides electricity to devices	C) Only a plug is made out of metal
D) A plug moves electricity from the outlet to a device, and an outlet provides electricity.	E) There are no differences between a plug and an outlet.
instances.output: D) A plug moves electricity from the outlet to a device, and an outlet provides electricity.

name: difference_2
instruction: Choose the differences between a door and an opening.

instances.input:
A) There is no difference between a door and an opening.	B) An opening is used to contain a door.	C) Doors are always the same size but openings can be different sizes.
D) Openings and doors both have hinges.	E) A door is used to seal an opening.
instances.output: E) A door is used to seal an opening.

name: difference_3
instruction: Choose the differences between a rim and a sconce.

instances.input:
A) Rims and sconces can be the edge of a wide variety of objects.	B) A sconce only holds candles while a rim can hold a variety of objects.	C) Both a sconce and a rim can hold candles.
D) Sconces are more common than rims in modern homes.	E) A rim and a sconce are the same object.
instances.output: B) A sconce only holds candles while a rim can hold a variety of objects.

name: difference_4
instruction: Choose the differences between a truck and a pallet jack.

instances.input:
A) Pallet jacks move pallets in a warehouse, but trucks can move a wide variety of objects on roads.	B) Only trucks have motors.	C) Only pallet jacks can move pallets.
D) Trucks and pallet jacks can be fully operational with manpower only.	E) There are no differences between a truck and a pallet jack.
instances.output: A) Pallet jacks move pallets in a warehouse, but trucks can move a wide variety of objects on roads.

name: diff_criteria_0
instruction: Choose the differences between a plate and a bowl in terms of when theyre used.

instances.input:
A) A plate and a bowl can both be used for cereal.	B) A plate is usually saved for decorations in a kitchen.	C) A bowl is for liquids and a plate is for solids.
D) A plate and a bowl can both be easily broken when dropped.	E) A bowl can fit a lot more inside of it, whereas with a plate it can roll off.
instances.output: C) A bowl is for liquids and a plate is for solids.

name: diff_criteria_1
instruction: Choose the differences between a photograph and a painting in terms of what they are made of.

instances.input:
A) A photograph is instant, while a painting takes a lot of time to create.	B) A photograph is printed ink, while a painting is brushed on paint.	C) A photograph and a painting are both made to be viewed by others.
D) A photograph and a painting can both be framed.	E) A photograph is made of colors, while a painting is muted.
instances.output: B) A photograph is printed ink, while a painting is brushed on paint.

name: diff_criteria_2
instruction: Choose the differences between a monitor and a dvd in terms of how big they are.

instances.input:
A) A monitor is usualy a big screen for displaying images and a dvd is a small disc that is inserted into a display to show images.	B) A monitor and a dvd are the same size.	C) A monitor is made to view a dvd.
D) A monitor is usually smaller than a dvd.	E) A monitor and dvd are both big objects to use.
instances.output: A) A monitor is usualy a big screen for displaying images and a dvd is a small disc that is inserted into a display to show images.

name: diff_criteria_3
instruction: Choose the differences between a door and a wall in terms of how breakable they are.

instances.input:
A) A door and a wall have no differences in terms of breakability.	B) A wall is made of plaster and can crumble when pressure is applied, while a door is made of wood and can withstand breakins.	C) A door can break under any amount of pressure, while a wall can withstand anything.
D) A door and a wall both separate space in a house.	E) There are more walls in a home than there are doors.
instances.output: B) A wall is made of plaster and can crumble when pressure is applied, while a door is made of wood and can withstand breakins.

name: diff_criteria_4
instruction: Choose the differences between a barn and a greenhouse in terms of what color they are.

instances.input:
A) A barn is usually painted, while a greenhouse is usually see-through.	B) A barn and a greenhouse are always painted green.	C) A barn houses animals, while a greenhouse houses plants.
D) The color of a barn and a greenhouse could be the same if you have enough paint for both.	E) A barn is made of wood, while a greenhouse is made of glass.
instances.output: A) A barn is usually painted, while a greenhouse is usually see-through.

name: explain_use_0
instruction: The following instructions are the numbered steps for how to use a fire hydrant. They are in the wrong order. Reorder the steps so they can be followed correctly.

instances.input:
1. use a hydrant wrench to turn the top nut of the hydrant counter-clockwise slowly to prevent gushing
2. screw a hose to the side of the fire hydrant
3. unscrew the side cap off the fire hydrant with a hydrant wrench
4. Turn until there is sufficient flow through the hose, then use the hose to put out fires in the vicinity.

name: explain_use_1
instruction: The following instructions are the numbered steps for how to use a thermal imaging camera for detecting people. They are in the wrong order. Reorder the steps so they can be followed correctly.

instances.input:
1. Point the camera at the area you wish to scan. This may involve sticking the lense in a small opening to a confined space.
2. Observe the monitor for bright, human shaped areas. Those are people that need to be saved.
3. Ensure the camera is powered and connected to its monitor.

name: explain_use_2
instruction: The following instructions are the numbered steps for how to use hydraulic lifts. They are in the wrong order. Reorder the steps so they can be followed correctly.

instances.input:
1. Place the hydraulic supports underneath the piece of rubble you need to lift.
2. Turn on the pump and allow fluid to slowly enter the support, making the support rise.
3. Add additional supports if necessary to lift larger pieces of rubble.
4. Make sure the support is rated to lift the weight of the rubble.
5. Connect the support to a hydraulic pump.

name: explain_use_3
instruction: The following instructions are the numbered steps for how to use an air horn. They are in the wrong order. Reorder the steps so they can be followed correctly.

instances.input:
1. To signal for people to evacuate, press the button for 1 second 3 times in quick succession.
2. To signal for quiet during a search, press the button for 3 seconds once. 
3. To signal for everyone to resume work, press the button once for 2 seconds and once for 1 second.
4. Press down on the button on top of the cannister.

name: explain_use_4
instruction: The following instructions are the numbered steps for how to use a concrete saw. They are in the wrong order. Reorder the steps so they can be followed correctly.

instances.input:
1.Push the blade in a straight line, ensuring it doesn't lean left or right.
2. Make sure your saw is connected to a water source for reducing dust while drilling. The water needs to be thick so that it doesn't impede the saw.
3. Make sure the concrete saw is connected to a battery or to a powered outlet.
4.Turn the saw on and insert the blade as deep into the concrete as possible.

name: equip_in_task_0
instruction: What role do fire hydrants play in putting out fires?

instances.input:
A) sprays water on flames	B) breaks down barriers	C) protects firefighters
D) carries equipment	E) water source for hoses
instances.output: E) water source for hoses

name: equip_in_task_1
instruction: What role does a shovel play in removing rubble?

instances.input:
A) breaks large pieces down for easier transport offsite	B) gets debris out of tight spaces	C) lifts large debris to access trapped victims
D) moves small pieces of debris by hand	E) signals others for silence
instances.output: D) moves small pieces of debris by hand

name: equip_in_task_2
instruction: What role does a concrete saw play in removing rubble?

instances.input:
A) accesses debris in tight spaces	B) lifts large debris to access trapped victims	C) breaks large pieces down for easier transport offsite
D)lifts heavy pieces into trucks	E) moves small pieces of rubble by hand
instances.output: C) breaks large pieces down for easier transport offsite

name: equip_in_task_3
instruction: What role does a thermal imaging camera play in removing identifying survivors after an earthquake?

instances.input:
A) removes debris on top of survivors	B) locates warm bodies trapped in debris	C) lifts debris to access trapped victims
D) hears cries for help	E) widens area where victim is trapped
instances.output: B) locates warm bodies trapped in debris

name: equip_in_task_4
instruction: What role do hydraulic lifts play in rescuing people after an earthquake?

instances.input:
A) lifts large debris to access trapped victims	B) cuts large debris to access trapped victims	C) rebuilds buildings
D) water source for dust reduction	E) pulls victim out of the rubble
instances.output: A) lifts large debris to access trapped victims

name: explain_use_0
instruction: The following instructions are the numbered steps for how to use a fire hydrant. They are in the wrong order. Reorder the steps so they can be followed correctly.

instances.output: a fireman is able to unscrew the cap off the fire hydrant, fit his hose to the fire hydrant, fill the hose with water, and then spray the hose on the fire

name: explain_use_1
instruction: The following instructions are the numbered steps for how to use a thermal imaging camera for detecting people. They are in the wrong order. Reorder the steps so they can be followed correctly.

instances.output:
1. Ensure the camera is powered and connected to its monitor.
2. Point the camera at the area you wish to scan. This may involve sticking the lense in a small opening to a confined space.
3. Observe the monitor for bright, human shaped areas. Those are people that need to be saved.

name: explain_use_2
instruction: The following instructions are the numbered steps for how to use hydraulic lifts. They are in the wrong order. Reorder the steps so they can be followed correctly.

instances.output: Place the hydraulic supports underneath the piece of rubble you need to lift. Make sure the support is rated to lift the weight of the rubble. Connect the support to a hydraulic pump. Turn on the pump and allow fluid to slowly enter the support, making the support rise. Add additional supports if necessary to lift larger pieces of rubble.

name: explain_use_3
instruction: The following instructions are the numbered steps for how to use an air horn. They are in the wrong order. Reorder the steps so they can be followed correctly.

instances.output:
1. Press down on the button on top of the cannister.
2. To signal for people to evacuate, press the button for 1 second 3 times in quick succession.
3. To signal for quiet during a search, press the button for 3 seconds once. 
4.

name: explain_use_4
instruction: The following instructions are the numbered steps for how to use a concrete saw. They are in the wrong order. Reorder the steps so they can be followed correctly.

instances.output:
1. Make sure the concrete saw is connected to a battery or to a powered outlet.
2. Make sure your saw is connected to a water source for reducing dust while drilling. The water needs to be thick so that it doesn't impede the saw.
3.Turn the saw on and insert the blade as deep into the concrete as possible.
4.Push the blade in a straight line, ensuring it doesn't lean left or right.

name: equip_used_0
instruction: Select the equipment needed for identifying trapped people after an earthquake.

instances.output: carbon dioxide detectors and thermal imaging equipment can be used to find survivors, even if they are unconscious

name: equip_used_1
instruction: Select the equipment needed for lifting rubble after an earthquake.

instances.output: hand removing debris is helpful to not crush survivors under the rubble and using hydraulic equpiment for the tougher spots can save lives

name: equip_used_2
instruction: Select the equipment needed for protecting search and rescue workers after an earthquake.

instances.output: rescuers should use protective equipment, such as special suits, gloves, masks, and air quality monitoring devices

name: equip_used_3
instruction: Select the equipment needed for signalling after an earthquake.

instances.output: a whistle, air horn, or any loud noise device can help signal after an earthquake

name: equip_used_4
instruction: Select the equipment needed for removing rubble after an earthquake.

instances.output: hand removing debris is helpful to not crush survivors under the rubble and using hydraulic equpiment for the tougher spots can save lives

name: equip_in_task_0
instruction: What role do fire hydrants play in putting out fires?

instances.output: fire hydrants provide an abundance of water to aid in putting out fires

name: equip_in_task_1
instruction: What role does a shovel play in removing rubble?

instances.output: A shovel is used to pick up smaller pieces of rubble and put them in a container to be removed from the work site.

name: equip_in_task_2
instruction: What role does a concrete saw play in removing rubble?

instances.output: A concrete saw is used to break down large pieces of concrete into smaller chunks that can be picked up and transported elsewhere more easily.

name: equip_in_task_3
instruction: What role does a thermal imaging camera play in removing identifying survivors after an earthquake?

instances.output: A rescue worker can stick the camera through openings in a collapsed building to scan a confined space, and the camera will be able to precisely locate a body because their heat signature will appear on the camera's monitor screen.

name: equip_in_task_4
instruction: What role do hydraulic lifts play in rescuing people after an earthquake?

instances.output: Hydraulic lifts can be placed under large pieces of rubble. Once they are powered by a hydraulic pump, they can lift the rubble, making a tunnel from the victim's void to the outside.
